citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 0900 on
03/04/2014.
Upon arrival contact was made with the licensee and the licensee stated that he was unavailable to conduct an
animal welfare inspection due to illness.
End of report.
